changeSet.author: elitecore
changeSet.comment: Adding new regex for Service.maxReadRate regex -1|([0-9]{0,19})$
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO TBLMREGEX( ID, CREATEDBYSTAFFID, CREATEDDATE, LASTUPDATEDBYSTAFFID, LASTUPDATEDDATE,STATUS, DESCRIPTION, ENTITY, REGEXKEY, VALUE) VALUES ((select (max(ID)+1) as num from TBLMREGEX), 1,SYSDATE, 1, SYSDATE,'ACTIVE', 'Service Max Read Rate', 'Service','Service.maxReadRate','-1|([0-9]{0,19})$');

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBLTPROFILENTITY WHERE ISDEFAULT='N' and ENTITYALIAS='COAP_COLLECTION_SERVICE'and SERVERTYPEID = 3;

changeSet.comment: Adding COAP_COLLECTION_SERVICE into list where license already exists
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO TBLTPROFILENTITY( ID, CREATEDBYSTAFFID, CREATEDDATE,LASTUPDATEDBYSTAFFID, LASTUPDATEDDATE,STATUS, ENTITYALIAS, ENTITYTYPE,ISDEFAULT,SERVERTYPEID,LICENSEID) select (select max(id+1) from TBLTPROFILENTITY), 0,SYSDATE, 0, SYSDATE,'INACTIVE','COAP_COLLECTION_SERVICE','SERVICE_TYPE','N',3, (select max(id) from tbltlicense where componenttype = 'SERVER_MANAGER') from dual where EXISTS (select 1 from tbltlicense where componenttype = 'SERVER_MANAGER' having max(id) > 0)

changeSet.author: elitecore

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBLTPROFILENTITY WHERE ISDEFAULT='N' and ENTITYALIAS='COAP_COLLECTION_SERVICE' and SERVERTYPEID = 3;

changeSet.comment: Adding COAP_COLLECTION_SERVICE into list where license already exists
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO TBLTPROFILENTITY( ID, CREATEDBYSTAFFID, CREATEDDATE,LASTUPDATEDBYSTAFFID, LASTUPDATEDDATE,STATUS, ENTITYALIAS, ENTITYTYPE,ISDEFAULT,SERVERTYPEID,LICENSEID) select (select max(id+1) from TBLTPROFILENTITY as t), 0,now(), 0, now(),'INACTIVE','COAP_COLLECTION_SERVICE','SERVICE_TYPE','N',3, (select max(id) from TBLTLICENSE as l where componenttype = 'SERVER_MANAGER') from dual where EXISTS (select 1 from TBLTLICENSE as t1 where componenttype = 'SERVER_MANAGER' having max(id) > 0)

changeSet.sql: UPDATE TBLMREGEX SET REGEXKEY='NetflowClient.resourcesName' WHERE REGEXKEY='NetflowClient.resourceName';

changeSet.author: elitecore
changeSet.sql: UPDATE TBLMREGEX SET VALUE='^[\_$\s\w-:./\\]{1,500}$' WHERE REGEXKEY='NetflowClient.secCerLocation';

changeSet.author: elitecore
changeSet.sql: UPDATE TBLMREGEX SET VALUE='^[\\_$\\s\\w-:./\\\\]{1,500}$' WHERE REGEXKEY='NetflowClient.secCerLocation';

changeSet.author: elitecore
changeSet.sql: UPDATE TBLMREGEX SET VALUE='^[0-9]{1,10}$' WHERE REGEXKEY in ('NetflowClient.observerTimeout','NetflowClient.requestTimeout','NetflowClient.requestRetryCount','NetflowClient.reqExecutionFreq');
